LanguageData.DMS_Bandwidth.label: Bandwidth Support
LanguageData.DMS_Bandwidth.description: Apply for the access of orbital bandwidth support, the amount of bandwidth is dependent on the applicant's current title. This support will be valid unless death or defection occurs on the applicant.
LanguageData.DMS_CallOrbitalSalvo.label: call Aerodrone Salvo
LanguageData.DMS_CallOrbitalSalvo.description: Call a salvo of aerodrone strikes around a target position.
LanguageData.DMS_CallOrbitalStrike.label: Call Aerodrone Strike
LanguageData.DMS_CallOrbitalStrike.description: Call a single-impact aerodrone strike on a target position.
LanguageData.DMS_CallTransportShuttle.label: Call Transport Shuttle
LanguageData.DMS_CallTransportShuttle.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.
LanguageData.DMS_CargoMech.label: Supply Cargo Mech
LanguageData.DMS_CargoMech.description: Apply for a Cargo Lifter mech that will belong to your side.
LanguageData.DMS_CombatDrop.label: Combat Supply Drop
LanguageData.DMS_CombatDrop.description: Call for a drop of standard combat supplies to your current area.
LanguageData.DMS_CombatMech.label: Supply Combat Mech
LanguageData.DMS_CombatMech.description: Apply for a Battle Friend mech to belong to your side.
LanguageData.DMS_CompDrop.label: Componments Drop
LanguageData.DMS_CompDrop.description: Call for a drop of stamp componments and wetware computer.
LanguageData.DMS_FoodDrop.label: Food Supply Drop
LanguageData.DMS_FoodDrop.description: Call for a drop of 20 packaged survival meals.
LanguageData.DMS_GearDrop.label: Combat Equipment Drop
LanguageData.DMS_GearDrop.description: Call for a combat supply for a combatant, which includes a set of tactical armor and emergency gears.
LanguageData.DMS_Join_Combat.label: Call Combatant Recruit
LanguageData.DMS_Join_Combat.description: Apply for a combatant whose life is yours to command from here on out.
LanguageData.DMS_Join_Logistic.label: Call Logistics Recruit
LanguageData.DMS_Join_Logistic.description: Apply for a worker whose life is yours to command from here on out.
LanguageData.DMS_LogiDrop.label: Logistics Supply Drop
LanguageData.DMS_LogiDrop.description: Call for a drop of 20 survival packs, 8 medicine and 4 compoments.
LanguageData.DMS_MaterialDrop.label: Construction Material Drop
LanguageData.DMS_MaterialDrop.description: Call for a drop of 500 silver and 250 steel.
LanguageData.DMS_Platoon_AC.label: Call Heavy Unit Support
LanguageData.DMS_Platoon_AC.description: Call down 4 Heavy Automatroids to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.DMS_Platoon_MT.label: Call Squad Support
LanguageData.DMS_Platoon_MT.description: Call for a squad of soldiers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.DMS_Squad_RC.label: Riot Control Support
LanguageData.DMS_Squad_RC.description: Call for a group of 4 riot control units to aid you in stopping a prison outbreak.
LanguageData.DMS_Squad_UC.label: Urban Combat Support
LanguageData.DMS_Squad_UC.description: Call for a group of 4 urban combat units to aid you in a raid or colony defense.
LanguageData.DMS_WorkerGroup.label: Call Worker Group
LanguageData.DMS_WorkerGroup.description: Call for a group of 8 workers to assist you for 6 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.DMS_WorkerTeam.label: Call Worker Team
LanguageData.DMS_WorkerTeam.description: Call for a group of 4 workers to assist you for 6 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
